scripts.copy-even-theme: shx mkdir -p themes/even-custom && npx shx cp node_modules/jsonresume-theme-even/dist/index.js themes/even-custom/index.js
scripts.clean: shx rm -rf dist && shx mkdir -p dist
scripts.build: npm run clean && node themes/even-custom/cli.js < resume.json > dist/index.html && npm run copy-robots
scripts.build-original-even-theme: npm run clean && resumed --theme jsonresume-theme-even -o dist/index.html && npm run copy-robots
